headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
There are select discounts available this week including 40% off all High End Apartment properties and half off all Mk II Weapon Upgrades. All that, plus sales on a variety of vehicles:

- Grotti Cheetah Classic – 30% off
- Vapid Winky – 30% off
- HVY Insurgent – 40% off
- Lampadati Casco – 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
